title: EU Rows Back on Irish Border Vaccine Curbs After Sparking Anger
content:
1. EU Rows Back on Irish Border Vaccine Curbs After Sparking Anger  Bloomberg
  2. Brexit: EU introduces controls on vaccines to NI  BBC News
  3. Arlene Foster: EU limit on vaccines into Northern Ireland is 'hostile and aggressive'  Guardian News
  4. After outcry, EU reverses plan to restrict vaccine exports through Irish border  Yahoo News
  5. EU, AstraZeneca vaccine dispute is not another 'Brexit battle,' Irish PM  CNBC
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 欧盟在爱尔兰边境疫苗限制问题上反悔，因为这引发了愤怒。
歐盟在愛爾蘭邊境疫苗限制問題上反悔，因爲這引發了憤怒。
